√bhāṣ 'speak'

present: [1.] bhāṣate etc. B.+  bhāṣati etc. E.+  

perfect: babhāṣe etc. B.+  

aorist: [1.] abhāṣi   -- [3.] ababhāṣat  abībhaṣat   -- [5.] abhāṣiṣi  

future: [1.] bhāṣiṣyate   -- [2.] bhāṣitā  

verbal: bhāṣita E.+  bhāṣitum U.+  bhāṣṭum  bhāṣitvā  -bhāṣya E.+  

secondary: passive: bhāṣyate etc. E.+   -- intensive: bābhāṣ-   -- desiderative: bibhāṣiṣa-   -- causative: bhāṣayati etc. E.+  bhāṣayate etc.  

derivatives: -bhāṣ  -bhāṣa E.+  bhāṣā S.+  bhāṣaka C.  bhāṣin E.  bhāṣya S.+  bhāṣaṇa E.+  -bhāṣaṇīya C.  bhāṣitavya E.  bhā́ṣitṛ B.+  

Related with roots bhā, bhās, bhan.
